name: Tick Tack
description: Tic-tac-toe is a paper-and-pencil game for two players, X and O, who take turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid. The player who succeeds in placing three of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game, here is computer version of this game , in this game your are playing with computer , which is smarter then you. But you can be much smarter then computer.......
